claims.claim: Johnson Controls processes hundreds of thousands of invoices per day across the organization worldwide
claims.quote: As such, it deals with "hundreds of thousands" of invoices per day across the organization, worldwide, Engel said.

claims.claim: Johnson Controls aims to achieve 90% hands-free invoice processing by end of year
claims.quote: Our goal from an IT standpoint is to get up in the 90s in terms of a percentage being handled hands-free, Engel said. I'm confident we'll make it to 90%, probably by the end of the year.

claims.claim: The pilot proved the technology works for creating a touchless AP system
claims.quote: If they all match up, you wind up having a touchless AP system, Engel said. In practice, exceptions in the business process and other "internal workings" sometimes thwart the automation routines. But the pilot proved the technology works, he said.

claims.quote: Johnson Controls is a Fortune 500 leader in building technology with more than $25B in annual revenue.

claims.claim: Johnson Controls processes approximately 100,000 invoices each month
claims.quote: With operations in 150+ countries and approximately 100,000 invoices processed each month, Johnson Controls runs AR at massive scale.
